perturbation.original_text: This Agreement may not be assigned by either party without prior written permission from the other party, which permission shall not be unreasonably withheld or delayed. Any attempt by either party to assign any right, or delegate any duty or obligation which arises under the Agreement without such permission will be voidable.
perturbation.changed_text: This Agreement may be assigned by either party with written permission from the other party, which permission may be granted or denied at the sole discretion of the granting party. Any attempt by either party to assign any right, or delegate any duty or obligation which arises under the Agreement without such permission will be void.
perturbation.explanation: The original text stated that assignment requires permission that cannot be unreasonably withheld. The modified version states that permission can be granted or denied at the sole discretion of the granting party, which contradicts the original restriction and creates uncertainty about assignment rights.

perturbation.original_text: This Agreement, including its attachment and order acknowledgments under the Agreement, constitutes the entire agreement between Distributor and NETGEAR with respect to the purchase, resale and distribution of the Products and is governed by the laws of the State of California except that body of law dealing with conflicts of law.
perturbation.changed_text: This Agreement, including its attachment and order acknowledgments under the Agreement, constitutes the agreement between Distributor and NETGEAR with respect to the purchase, resale and distribution of the Products. The governing law for disputes arising from this agreement will be decided by the courts in the jurisdiction where the dispute occurs.
perturbation.explanation: The original text specified California law as governing. The modified text leaves the governing law open to determination by the jurisdiction where a dispute arises, contradicting the original clause and introducing uncertainty about which legal framework applies.

perturbation.original_text: Distributor agrees that the foregoing Discount is only applicable to Products included on the NETGEAR Price List on the Effective Date of this Agreement. NETGEAR reserves the right to add Products to the Price List at its sole discretion and any such additional Products shall be offered to Distributor at discounts to be determined at that time.
perturbation.changed_text: Distributor agrees that the foregoing Discount may or may not be applicable to Products included on the NETGEAR Price List on the Effective Date of this Agreement. NETGEAR reserves the right to add Products to the Price List at its sole discretion, additional Products might be offered to Distributor at discounts to be determined at that time.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states the discount 'is only applicable', creating a clear condition. The modified text changes this to 'may or may not be applicable', directly contradicting the original statement and introducing uncertainty about whether the discount applies to existing products on the price list.
